Description: * {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} now reveals you after 20s from initial pickup
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} sprint changed from +3/5 for winning/losing team to +2/6
* First {{PageRef|Flex Slot|alt_name=flex slot}} is now granted after 3 {{PageRef|Guardian}}s die instead of 4
* Base kill bounty reduced from 225 to 150 (still scales to 1400 over time)
* Respawn time at 20 minutes reduced from 45s to 40s
* T3 {{PageRef|Golden Statue}}s spawn time moved from 25 min to 30 min
* Range to attack lane {{PageRef|Guardian}}s increased from 19m to 20m
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Lightning Ball}} T3 reduced from +2m Radius to +1m
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Rage decay rate increased from 0.25 to 0.3
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Rage buffer duration reduced from 12s to 10s
